roleset.name: provide money for
roleset.note: MONEY-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in ectb revisions. Framed by Claire. (from money.01-v predicate notes)

roles.note: Arg 2 is probably rare, but attested nonetheless. (from money.01-v)

example.name: Adjectival usage
example.text: The results show that the people of Taiwan believe that the most urgent problems are crime , " black gold politics " -LRB- the confluence of organized crime , moneyed interests , and corrupt politicians -RRB- , and raising economic competitiveness .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He moneyed the lab with income from his inventions.
